r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Avenai. The average
  contract duration was 0.88 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $375.1K. The longest
  contract was 3.25 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.7M.
lookup_name: 'AVENAI'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '4'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '40%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '29%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.25'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.88'
s421_mean_contract_value: '375.1K'
s425_max_duration: '3.25'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.7M'
